content: pattern was featured on knit & crochet today episode 1 show 105 cables made easy **from the description ** if you re new to cables give this scarf a try it s based on the tuscan cables repeat from the fisherman sweater once you ve mastered this pattern you may be ready to try the sweater also at knitting daily 2 was on episode 410 1 http //www redheart com/files/patterns/pdf/ctdec06-68 pdf 2 https //www interweave com/article/crochet/starter-scarf-from-knitting-daily-tv-episode-410/ cid=search
